mapper.insert: insert into tasklist (task_type, task_pay, task_from, is_enable, is_hidden, task_desc, task_url, task_mid, task_img) values (#{taskType}, #{taskPay}, #{taskFrom}, #{isEnable}, #{isHidden}, #{taskDesc}, #{taskUrl}, #{taskMid}, #{taskImg});
mapper.select: select task_type, task_pay, task_from, create_time, task_desc, task_url from tasklist where is_enable = 1 and is_hidden = 0

SELECT t1.id as task_id, u.name as from_user, p.name as type_name, t1.task_type, t1.task_desc, t1.task_pay, t1.task_url, t1.task_img FROM tasklist as t1 left join task_type p on t1.task_type = p.id left join `user` u on t1.task_from = u.id WHERE t1.id not in ( select tf.task_id from taskfilter tf where user_email = #{email} ) and t1.task_from != #{userId} and t1.id >= (RAND() * (SELECT MAX(tt.id) FROM tasklist tt)) limit #{size};
